alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Floyd; Harrison; Orange; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:25PM EDT until June 25 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harrison County in south central Indiana... Northeastern Crawford County in south central Indiana... Northwestern Floyd County in south central Indiana... Southeastern Orange County in south central Indiana... Southwestern Washington County in south central Indiana... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Paoli, moving southeast at 35 mph. This storm has a history of Golf Ball to Baseball size hail. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corydon, Palmyra, Marengo, Milltown, Greenville, Hardinsburg, Crandall, Fredericksburg, Moberly and Byrneville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Indiana. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
